briefdescription.para: Determine if specified TableId is contained in argument mask.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Determines whether specified Table Id is contained in argument mask.

parameterdescription.para: Mask representing current status of all dwell tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Updates the control structure used by the application for dwell packet processing with address count, data size, and rate.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: A zero value for length in a dwell table entry represents the end of the active portion of a dwell table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Checks for valid value (1..MD_DWELL_TABLE_SIZE ) for entry id specified in Jam command.

parameterdescription.para: EntryId (starting at one) for dwell control structure entry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function validates that the memory range as specified by the input address and size is valid for reading.

parameterdescription.para: Size, in bytes, of field to be read.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Check valid range for TableId argument used in several Memory Dwell commands. Valid range is 1..MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Note that this value will be internally converted to 0..(MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES-1) for indexing into arrays.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Check valid range for dwell field length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Valid values for dwell field length are 0, 1, 2, and 4. 0 corresponds to a null entry in Dwell Table.

parameterdescription.para: Length of field, in bytes, to be copied for dwell.
